verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <S%H8141><s%> In the year בֹּ֤א <S%H935><s%> came תַרְתָּן֙ <S%H8661><s%> that Tartan אַשְׁדּ֔וֹדָה <S%H795><s%> unto Ashdod בִּשְׁלֹ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sent אֹת֔וֹ <S%H853><s%> סַֽרְג֖וֹן <S%H5623><s%> (when Sargon מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וַיִּלָּ֥חֶם <S%H3898><s%> him) and fought בְּאַשְׁדּ֖וֹד <S%H795><s%> against Ashdod וַֽיִּלְכְּדָֽהּ׃ <S%H3920><s%> and took

בָּעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> At the same time הַהִ֗יא <S%H1931><s%> he דִּבֶּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָה֮ <S%H3069><s%> God בְּיַ֣ד <S%H3027><s%> by יְשַׁעְיָ֣הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Isaiah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אָמוֹץ֮ <S%H531><s%> of Amoz לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying לֵ֗ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walking וּפִתַּחְתָּ֤ <S%H6605><s%> and loose הַשַּׂק֙ <S%H8242><s%> the sackcloth מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from מָתְנֶ֔יךָ <S%H4975><s%> from off thy loins וְנַעַלְךָ֥ <S%H5275><s%> thy shoe תַחֲלֹ֖ץ <S%H2502><s%> and put off מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> and רַגְלֶ֑יךָ <S%H7272><s%> from thy foot וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> And he did so כֵּ֔ן <S%H3651><s%> so הָלֹ֖ךְ <S%H1980><s%> going עָר֥וֹם <S%H6174><s%> naked וְיָחֵֽף׃ <S%H3182><s%> and barefoot ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after הָלַ֛ךְ <S%H1980><s%> hath walked עַבְדִּ֥י <S%H5650><s%> Like as my servant יְשַׁעְיָ֖הוּ <S%H3470><s%> Isaiah עָר֣וֹם <S%H6174><s%> naked וְיָחֵ֑ף <S%H3182><s%> and barefoot שָׁלֹ֤שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנִים֙ <S%H8141><s%> years א֣וֹת <S%H226><s%> [for] a sign וּמוֹפֵ֔ת <S%H4159><s%> and wonder עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> upon Egypt וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against כּֽוּשׁ׃ <S%H3568><s%> and upon Ethiopia

כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> so יִנְהַ֣ג <S%H5090><s%> lead away מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> So shall the king אַ֠שּׁוּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁבִ֨י <S%H7628><s%> prisoners מִצְרַ֜יִם <S%H4714><s%> the Egyptians וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> גָּל֥וּת <S%H1546><s%> captives כּ֛וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> and the Ethiopians נְעָרִ֥ים <S%H5288><s%> young וּזְקֵנִ֖ים <S%H2205><s%> and old עָר֣וֹם <S%H6174><s%> naked וְיָחֵ֑ף <S%H3182><s%> and barefoot וַחֲשׂוּפַ֥י <S%H2834><s%> uncovered שֵׁ֖ת <S%H8357><s%> even with [their] buttocks עֶרְוַ֥ת <S%H6172><s%> to the shame מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וְחַתּ֖וּ <S%H2865><s%> And they shall be afraid וָבֹ֑שׁוּ <S%H954><s%> and ashamed מִכּוּשׁ֙ <S%H3568><s%> of Ethiopia מַבָּטָ֔ם <S%H4007><s%> their expectation וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> because מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> and of Egypt תִּפְאַרְתָּֽם׃ <S%H8597><s%> their glory

וְ֠אָמַר <S%H559><s%> shall say יֹשֵׁ֨ב <S%H3427><s%> And the inhabitant הָאִ֣י <S%H339><s%> of this isle הַזֶּה֮ <S%H2088><s%> he בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַהוּא֒ <S%H1931><s%> he הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> Behold כֹ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> Behold such מַבָּטֵ֗נוּ <S%H4007><s%> [is] our expectation אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נַ֤סְנוּ <S%H5127><s%> whither we flee שָׁם֙ <S%H8033><s%> for לְעֶזְרָ֔ה <S%H5833><s%> for help לְהִ֨נָּצֵ֔ל <S%H5337><s%> to be delivered מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> from מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> the king אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> of Assyria וְאֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> how נִמָּלֵ֥ט <S%H4422><s%> and how shall we escape אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <S%H587><s%> ourselves ס
